npc.statement: The foundation of human intelligence is our ability to learn. All human progress has been the result of learning from our past efforts, evolving our understanding and inventing new solutions. Computer scientists have been trying to get machines to learn like humans for decades. In machine learning, computers analyze data, find patterns in the data and use those patterns to find the best route to a goal. Advancements in data and computation have transformed machine learning. Artificial Intelligence is teaching us things we never would have been able to find on our own.
How to provide insights on complex and volatile data?
WHAT IS THE SOLUTION? AI systems can transform unstructured data into knowledge
How does an AI system learn?
AI enables a partnership between humans and technology.
AI systems can go beyond knowledge, they understand, reason, learn, and interact.
We can take the best experts and make them better by introducing man and machine.
